components.label: Analysis Steps
components.description: Analysis broken down into individual steps as defined by the researcher. List of analysis steps.

components.label: Analysis Order
components.description: Order in which the above steps are performed. Analysis steps may be repeated here keeping the order intact.

components.label: Analysis Code Repository
components.description: Path to the code repository containing the analysis scripts. List of strings.

components.label: Similar to
components.description: If the analysis is similar to that described in other papers / repositories, the DOI of the relevant resource may be provided here.
